All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Cart
Represents a Cart entity with its attributes.
Customer
Represents a Customer entity with its attributes.
CustomerNotFoundException
Exception for handling cases when a customer was not found.
DBConnection
Utility class for managing database connections.
EcomApp
Main class for the E-commerce application.
EcomController
This class represents the controller for the E-commerce application.
EcomInterface
Interface defining methods for an EcomController.
Order
Represents an Order entity with its attributes.
OrderItem
Represents an OrderItem entity with its attributes.
OrderNotFoundException
Exception for handling cases when an order was not found.
OrderProcessorRepository
Interface defining methods for an OrderProcessorRepositoryImpl.
OrderProcessorRepositoryImpl
Implementation of OrderProcessorRepository interface for handling database operations.
OrderProcessorRepositoryImplTest
This class contains test cases for the OrderProcessorRepositoryImpl class.
Product
Represents a Product entity with its attributes.
ProductNotFoundException
Exception handling cases when a product was not found.
PropertyUtil
Utility class for loading properties from a file.
